id.title: universally unique ID for event
id.description: represents a univerally unique ID for an event instance. This value is optional, but can be useful when correlating events to notifications.

source.title: The event source / component name
source.description: Represents a unique ID for the source of the event, such as a UUID. This ID should be unique per invocation of a component instance, i.e. if a component restarts it will have a different source ID.

source-type.title: The event source / component name
source-type.description: Represents the type or class of component. This value is not unique per invocation and shared amoung all instances of a given type or class, e.g., org.opencord.analytics-engine

timestamp.title: event timestamp
timestamp.description: The time space in UTC assigned by the source of the event.

type.title: type of event
type.description: the type of the event as defined by the standard naming conventions. e.g., org.opencord.metrics.in-packets

labels.title: labels for event
labels.description: list of labels associated with event
